channel.title: Black Mesa doesn't appear at the Steam library!
channel.description:
Hey guys, I looked up on a guide on how to install Black Mesa (a guide that someone from this forum directed me to), and I think I followed every step correctly, I installed the game, installed Source SDK Base, and I restarted Steam, but for some reason the mod doesn't appear at the library. I tried this multiple time, and it never does. I can only play the game after I install it, so I have to always reinstall it to play the game. Any ideas on how to solve this, please? :slight_smile:
EDIT: Never mind guys, I solved the problem myself, the problem was that I didn't install the game at the Steam Mod folder, so it didn't appear at the library.
